checkpoint.name: Adequate air exchanges are maintained
Air quality in Lab
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Negative Pressure for microbiology

checkpoint.name: SNCU has system to maintain ventilation and its environment should be dust free
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: Ventilation can be provided in two ways: exhaust only and supply-and-exhaust. Exhaust fans pull stale air out of the unit while drawing fresh air in through cracks, windows or fresh air intakes. Exhaust-only ventilation is a good choice for units that do not have existing ductwork to distribute heated or cooled air
